odyssey_description: Odyssey is your all-in-one travel platform: create AI-powered itineraries, share your adventures, follow fellow travelers, and discover amazing destinations worldwide.
features_description: From AI-powered itineraries to social sharing, Odyssey brings together everything you need for unforgettable journeys.
smart_route_desc: AI calculates the most efficient routes, saving you time and maximizing your adventure.
flexible_scheduling_desc: Build day-by-day itineraries that adapt to your pace, with the flexibility to adjust plans on the go.
budget_optimization_desc: Set your budget and get smart recommendations for cost-effective options.
traveler_feed_desc: Follow friends and fellow travelers, see updates, stories, and tips from the community.
share_your_journey_desc: Post photos, videos, and travel notes for others to discover and get inspired.
global_connections_desc: Join travel groups, connect with like-minded explorers, and discover trending destinations worldwide.
community_description: Follow travelers, share your adventures, get inspired by real experiences, and discover trending destinations.
connect_with_friends_desc: Follow friends, join travel groups, and interact with fellow explorers.
share_your_moments_desc: Upload photos, videos, and travel stories to inspire the community.
plan_trips_together_desc: Create itineraries, collaborate with friends, and share your planned routes.
join_odyssey_description: Join Odyssey to plan smart trips, share your journeys, and connect with travelers worldwide.
footer_description: A social travel platform to plan trips, share adventures, and connect with fellow travelers.

HelpCenter.title: Help Center
HelpCenter.subtitle: How can we help you today?
HelpCenter.planningTripsDesc: How to create and manage your trips
HelpCenter.contactSupportDesc: Need more help? We're here for you

faqs.question: How do I create a new trip?
faqs.answer: To create a new trip, simply click on the 'Plan Your Trip' button on the homepage or navigate to the 'Plan Trip' section. You'll be guided through a few steps to set your preferences, budget, and dates.

faqs.question: Is Odyssey free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Odyssey is currently free to use for all travelers. You can create itineraries, share them with friends, and explore the community feed without any cost.

faqs.question: Can I share my itinerary with friends?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Once you've created a trip, you can share it by clicking the 'Share' button. You can also invite friends to collaborate on the trip planning.

faqs.question: How do I report inappropriate content?
faqs.answer: If you see content that violates our community guidelines, you can report it by clicking the 'Report' option available on every post and comment.

faqs.question: Can I use Odyssey offline?
faqs.answer: Currently, Odyssey requires an internet connection to access all features, including AI route planning and social feeds. We are working on offline capabilities for saved itineraries.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us when you use Odyssey, including when you create an account, update your profile, use our interactive features, participate in a survey or contest, communicate with customer service, or otherwise communicate with us.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our Services, to develop new services, and to protect Odyssey and our users. We also use this information to offer you tailored content.

sections.title: 3. Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not share personal information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Odyssey except in the following cases: with your consent, for external processing, or for legal reasons.

sections.title: 4. Information Security
sections.content: We work hard to protect Odyssey and our users from unauthorized access to or unauthorized alteration, disclosure, or destruction of information we hold.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
sections.content: You can access, update, or delete your personal information at any time by logging into your account. You can also request that we delete your account.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using Odyssey ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. In addition, when using these particular services, you shall be subject to any posted guidelines or rules applicable to such services.

sections.title: 2. Use License
sections.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Odyssey's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
list: use the materials for any commercial purpose, or for any public display (commercial or non-commercial);
attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on Odyssey's website;
remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or
transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server.

sections.title: 3. User Account
sections.content: To access certain features of the Service, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer, and you agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password.

sections.title: 4. Content
sections.content: Our Service allows you to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, videos, or other material ("Content"). You are responsible for the Content that you post to the Service, including its legality, reliability, and appropriateness.

sections.title: 5. Termination
sections.content: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
